Html:
I was able to download, install, create my own custom sections, validate them, see intellisense work in the config file generated.

How would I add this to another project. Lets say I have a console application which would need custom sections created by the CSD project. I don't seem to find any documentation around it. Also I tried to get the .csd.cs file, add it to my Console application, that does not seem to work. Please assist.
Could you please be more specific: Did it work in ANY project at all?  If yes, did you copy over ALL generated files?
